description: I'd never self-celebrate and expect others to dip into their own pockets for me. Not how I do things. So I've got your food covered. But you'll pay for your own drinks at the bar.

If you're not going to be around, it's too much effort for you to make it to the location, or there's no familiar face on the guest list, it's absolutely fine. If it were me, I wouldn't come either. Besides, it's a win-win; you're either blessing me with your presence or blessing my wallet with your absence.

They're not permitted. No exceptions. But I'm willing to be bribed: £32 for your plus-one's seat and food + £18 for emotional insurance. Yes. Emotional insurance. If we have a deal, transfer £50 to my account before Monday 1st November and they'll get an invite too. Good doing business with ya, chum.
If you plan on turning up more than 20 minutes late, I'll only see that as a sign of disrespect of my time and money. You'd be better off staying at home. Don't bother yourself. Really.
